amendatorysection.para: For purposes of sections 60-6,266 to 60-6,273, occupant protection system means a system utilizing a lap belt, a shoulder belt, or any combination of belts installed in a motor vehicle which (1) restrains drivers and passengers and (2) conforms to Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards, 49 C.F.R. 571.207, 571.208, 571.209, and 571.210, as such standards existed on January 1, 2009, or to the federal motor vehicle safety standards for passenger restraint systems applicable for the motor vehicle's model year.
